item.author: aherPrashant70@gmail.com (Prashant Aher)
item.description:
About me

Hello there, I am Prashant Aher. I am programmer, mobile apps developer and movies enthusiast.

I am currently working at Numerify as a Software Engineer. I mostly work on Java, Python stacks, especially Spring, Hibernate, Angular Js and Flask.

I graduated from VNIT in Computer Science and Engineering. In past I have done some internship with IITB, Tata Power.

See my complete resume here
